articles.title: Hologic's GYN Surgical Segment Looks Poised for Long-Term Growth
articles.mainIdea: Hologic's GYN Surgical Segment Looks Poised for Long-Term Growth
articles.summary: Zacks: Hologic's GYN Surgical Segment Looks Poised for Long-Term Growth. HOLX's GYN Surgical unit gains momentum as the demand for gynecological devices rises globally, driven by innovation, M&A and strong overseas adoption. Related tickers mentioned: ABT, HOLX.
